column4: I need some help guys. My computer is clicking. :( So loud last night it woke me up. I turned the computer off, and when I awoke in the morning I turned it back on to backup in, assumingly, the last stages of its harddrives last breaths. Ubuntu wouldn't load. I then assumed that it was my main hard drive (not my two others in storage, one just a week old). when I replaced it and booted it up, it still clicked loudly. The Ubuntu live
thats the problem - its HARDWARE nothing to do with OS
don't talk rubbish a clicking harddrive with no os has nothing to do with windows/linux/mac ox
